titleStmt.title: A declaration of the Lords and Commons in Parliament concerning an illegall writ sent to the High Sheriff of Essex by His Majesty, for the publishing of his late proclamation to forbid all his loving subjects to raise, march, muster or excercise by vertue of any order or ordinance of both Houses of Parliament
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

titleStmt.title: A declaration of the Lords and Commons in Parliament concerning an illegall writ sent to the High Sheriff of Essex by His Majesty, for the publishing of his late proclamation to forbid all his loving subjects to raise, march, muster or excercise by vertue of any order or ordinance of both Houses of Parliament
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by A. Norton for Edw. Husbands and Iohn Fanke,

notesStmt.note: "Ordered by the Lords and Commons that this be forth-with printed. H. Elsynge, Cler. Par. D. Com."
